message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire an item valued at $10,000 by you, while also getting a great deal compared to its market value. I believe this offer presents a win-win situation for both of us.

Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product, but unfortunately, $12,000 is a bit outside of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000, which is the maximum I can afford.  Let me know if you're open to discussing that price.
